com.rockhoppertech.music.Pitch

  • Packages that use Pitch 
    Package Description
    com.rockhoppertech.music
    These are the "core" or essential music classes.
    com.rockhoppertech.music.chord
    Chord classes.
    com.rockhoppertech.music.midi.js
    These are the classes that use JavaSound to manipulate MIDI files, create MIDI data, and play them.
    com.rockhoppertech.music.midi.parse
    MIDI String Parsing.
    com.rockhoppertech.music.scale
    Scale classes.
